pl.edu.agh.cs.kraksimcitydesigner.element
Class Intersection

java.lang.Object
  pl.edu.agh.cs.kraksimcitydesigner.element.Node
      pl.edu.agh.cs.kraksimcitydesigner.element.Intersection
All Implemented Interfaces:
CityElement, Clickable
public class Intersection
extends Node

Klasa zostala wzbogacona o pole na MappedTraffic, zmodyfikowany zostal konstruktor kopiujacy tak aby poprawnie replikowal to pole

Author:
Pawel Pierzchala

updateTrafficLights

public void updateTrafficLights()
Check if there are some incoming lane that doesn't have a state set for a phase. If yes, it sets it to GREEN.

checkAnglesFor3WaySimple

public java.util.List<Node> checkAnglesFor3WaySimple()
Checks if this intersection and nodes given as arguments form 3WaySimple intersection i.e. two nodes are almost in straight line and third node form angle of 90 degree to this line.

Returns:
list of nodes in counter-clockwise order if intersection is OK, or null

public boolean createDefaultActions4WaySimple(boolean override)
Creates default actions and simple traffic lights schedule (all green). Actions are overridden if override parameter is set to true, but light states are always overridden.
